players.name: Alice
memory: You: " I think Bob is the mafioso, because he said he was innocent."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Don't trust my words, but look at the evidence."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso, because he confessed to it. I think we should lynch him now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
